item.title: Tribute to Griffin Park
item.description: Ode to Griffin Park Griffin Park’s famous four corners make it the only football ground in England with four pubs on the four corners surrounding the ground. Here’s a link to the curated twitter thread. In the Beginning The Griffin To the Brook The Brook Sussex Best at the Brook The Garden Up New Road The New Road Gate at Griffin Park The New Inn Doom Bar Rules on the Main – Ealing – Road
